React Native

Mere

Daily journal app. 2017 Congressional App Challenge winner.

> Go to website > View on Github

Mere was created in fall of 2017 for the Congressional App Challenge.

My grandma was my inspiration. When I was younger, she used to call me after school and ask me what was the best, worst, and funniest part of my day.

I turned this question into a journal app.

â€‹"Highly innovative and will help users daily as they document their thoughts and emotions." - Rep. Anna G. Eshoo, CA-18
